document.title: Contributing Prompts to Promptexify
document.description: Learn how to share your successful AI prompts with the Promptexify community and help others achieve better results with AI tools.

body.raw:
# Contributing Prompts to Promptexify

Help grow our community by sharing your successful AI prompts! This guide will walk you through everything you need to know about contributing high-quality prompts to Promptexify.

## Why Contribute?

### Build Your Reputation

**Community Recognition**

- Gain recognition as a prompt expert
- Build your profile and credibility
- Connect with other AI enthusiasts and professionals
- Showcase your expertise in specific domains

**Contributor Benefits**

- Priority access to new features
- Exclusive contributor badge on your profile
- Higher visibility for your prompts
- Invitation to contributor-only events and discussions

### Help the Community

**Knowledge Sharing**

- Share techniques that have worked for you
- Help others save time and improve their results
- Contribute to the collective AI knowledge base
- Support newcomers in their AI journey

**Quality Improvement**

- Raise the overall quality of available prompts
- Share best practices and methodologies
- Help establish community standards
- Foster innovation and creativity

## Contribution Requirements

### Quality Standards

**Prompt Effectiveness**

- Must be tested and proven to work effectively
- Should produce consistent, high-quality results
- Must be applicable to the specified AI platform
- Should solve a real problem or provide value

**Originality**

- Original prompts or significant improvements on existing ones
- Clear attribution if building on others' work
- No direct copying from other sources
- Unique insights or approaches encouraged

**Clarity & Documentation**

- Clear, well-written prompt text
- Proper formatting and structure
- Comprehensive description and usage instructions
- Examples of successful outputs (when appropriate)

### Content Guidelines

**Appropriate Content**

- Professional and educational content
- Safe for work and family-friendly
- Respectful and inclusive language
- No harmful, illegal, or unethical applications

**Technical Requirements**

- Specific to compatible AI platforms
- Properly formatted for optimal performance
- Include necessary parameters and settings
- Clear variable placeholders where applicable

## How to Submit Prompts

### Access the Contribution Interface

1. **Navigate to Contribute Section**

   - Log into your Promptexify account
   - Go to Dashboard â†’ Contribute
   - Or visit `/dashboard/posts/new` directly

2. **Choose Contribution Type**
   - New original prompt
   - Improved version of existing prompt
   - Prompt collection or series
   - Tutorial or educational content

### Submission Process

#### Step 1: Basic Information

**Prompt Title**

- Clear, descriptive title (50-100 characters)
- Include the primary use case or benefit
- Avoid clickbait or misleading titles
- Use proper capitalization and grammar

**Description**

- Comprehensive explanation of the prompt's purpose
- Who should use this prompt and why
- What problems it solves or value it provides
- Expected outcomes and benefits

#### Step 2: Prompt Details

**Category Selection**

- Choose the most appropriate primary category
- Add relevant subcategories if applicable
- Select target AI platform(s)
- Indicate difficulty level (Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced)

**Prompt Content**

- The actual prompt text that users will copy
- Use clear variable placeholders like [TOPIC], [STYLE], etc.
- Include any necessary formatting or structure
- Optimize for the target AI platform

#### Step 3: Usage Instructions

**Setup Requirements**

- Any specific settings or configurations needed
- Platform-specific instructions
- Prerequisites or preparation steps
- Version compatibility notes

**Customization Guide**

- How to adapt the prompt for different use cases
- Variable explanations and examples
- Tips for optimization and improvement
- Common pitfalls to avoid

#### Step 4: Examples & Evidence

**Sample Outputs** (Optional but Recommended)

- Screenshots or text examples of successful results
- Multiple examples showing different applications
- Before/after comparisons if applicable
- Performance metrics or success rates

**Testing Documentation**

- Which AI platforms you've tested on
- Different scenarios where you've used the prompt
- Feedback from others who've tested it
- Refinements made based on testing

### Submission Review Process

#### Initial Review (1-2 Days)

**Automated Checks**

- Content policy compliance
- Format and structure validation
- Duplicate detection
- Basic quality metrics

**Manual Review**

- Prompt effectiveness assessment
- Content quality and clarity
- Community value evaluation
- Technical accuracy verification

#### Community Testing (3-5 Days)

**Beta Testing Group**

- Selected community members test your prompt
- Feedback collection and analysis
- Performance validation across different users
- Refinement suggestions if needed

#### Final Approval (1-2 Days)

**Quality Assurance**

- Final review by prompt experts
- Integration with platform systems
- SEO and discoverability optimization
- Publication and community notification

## Best Practices for Contributors

### Prompt Development

#### Research & Planning

**Market Analysis**

- Research existing prompts in your category
- Identify gaps or improvement opportunities
- Analyze successful prompts for patterns
- Study community feedback and requests

**Use Case Definition**

- Clearly define the target audience
- Specify the problems your prompt solves
- Outline the expected outcomes
- Consider different user skill levels

#### Testing & Refinement

**Comprehensive Testing**

- Test across multiple AI platforms if applicable
- Try different input variations
- Test with various user personas
- Document all results and observations

**Iterative Improvement**

- Refine based on initial results
- Incorporate feedback from beta testers
- Optimize for consistency and reliability
- Create multiple versions for different needs

### Documentation Excellence

#### Clear Instructions

**Step-by-Step Guidance**

- Break down complex prompts into simple steps
- Provide context and background information
- Include troubleshooting tips
- Offer variation suggestions

**Visual Aids**

- Use formatting to highlight important sections
- Include code blocks for technical prompts
- Add bullet points and numbered lists
- Consider screenshots for complex setups

#### User-Friendly Language

**Accessibility**

- Write in clear, simple language
- Avoid unnecessary jargon or technical terms
- Provide definitions for specialized concepts
- Consider non-native English speakers

**Engagement**

- Use active voice and direct instructions
- Include encouraging and supportive tone
- Share personal insights and experiences
- Make the content enjoyable to read

### Community Engagement

#### Responding to Feedback

**Constructive Interaction**

- Respond promptly to questions and comments
- Thank users for feedback and suggestions
- Address criticisms professionally
- Update prompts based on valid feedback

**Continuous Improvement**

- Monitor how your prompts are being used
- Collect usage statistics and success stories
- Release updated versions when beneficial
- Share lessons learned with the community

#### Building Relationships

**Networking**

- Connect with other contributors
- Participate in community discussions
- Share knowledge and experiences
- Collaborate on prompt development

**Mentorship**

- Help new contributors get started
- Review and provide feedback on others' prompts
- Share best practices and techniques
- Foster a supportive community environment

## Contribution Types

### Individual Prompts

**Single-Use Prompts**

- Focused on one specific task or outcome
- Clear, direct instructions
- Easy to understand and implement
- Perfect for beginners

**Complex Prompts**

- Multi-step processes
- Advanced techniques and methodologies
- Suitable for experienced users
- May require additional explanation

### Prompt Collections

**Themed Collections**

- Related prompts for specific industries
- Complete workflows or processes
- Progressive difficulty levels
- Comprehensive coverage of a topic

**Series or Courses**

- Educational sequences
- Building complexity over multiple prompts
- Learning pathways for skill development
- Structured knowledge transfer

### Tutorial Content

**How-To Guides**

- Educational content about prompt techniques
- Best practices and methodologies
- Platform-specific tips and tricks
- Advanced strategy explanations

**Case Studies**

- Real-world application examples
- Success stories and results
- Problem-solving approaches
- Lessons learned and insights

## Recognition & Rewards

### Contributor Levels

**Bronze Contributor**

- 5+ approved prompts
- Community contributor badge
- Access to contributor forums
- Monthly contributor newsletter

**Silver Contributor**

- 25+ approved prompts with high ratings
- Featured contributor status
- Early access to new features
- Invitation to contributor calls

**Gold Contributor**

- 100+ approved prompts with excellent community feedback
- Expert contributor designation
- Revenue sharing opportunities (coming soon)
- Direct input on platform development

**Platinum Contributor**

- Top 1% of contributors by impact and quality
- Advisory board invitation
- Speaking opportunities at events
- Custom recognition and promotion

### Benefits & Incentives

**Immediate Benefits**

- Public recognition on your profile
- Increased visibility for your content
- Community connections and networking
- Personal satisfaction from helping others

**Long-term Opportunities**

- Partnership opportunities with Promptexify
- Speaking engagements and webinars
- Collaboration with AI companies
- Building personal brand and expertise

## Getting Help as a Contributor

### Support Resources

**Contributor Documentation**

- Detailed guidelines and best practices
- Template and formatting guides
- Video tutorials and walkthroughs
- FAQ for common questions

**Community Support**

- Contributor forums and discussion groups
- Peer review and feedback systems
- Mentorship programs
- Regular community events

### Direct Support

**Contributor Success Team**

- Email: contributors@promptexify.com
- Live chat support during business hours
- One-on-one guidance for new contributors
- Technical assistance and troubleshooting

**Regular Check-ins**

- Monthly contributor calls
- Quarterly feedback sessions
- Annual contributor survey
- Continuous improvement initiatives

## Next Steps

### Ready to Contribute?

1. **Plan Your First Contribution**

   - Identify a prompt you've had success with
   - Research the category and competition
   - Prepare your documentation and examples
   - Review our quality guidelines

2. **Submit Your Prompt**

   - Navigate to the Contribute section
   - Fill out the submission form completely
   - Include all required documentation
   - Submit for review

3. **Engage with the Community**
   - Join contributor forums
   - Connect with other contributors
   - Participate in discussions and feedback
   - Build your reputation and network

### Need Support?

Have questions about contributing? We're here to help:

- **Contributor Guide**: Detailed documentation and tutorials
- **Community Forums**: Connect with other contributors
- **Support Team**: Direct assistance for questions and issues
- **Video Tutorials**: Visual guides for the contribution process

---

**Ready to share your expertise?** [Start contributing today](/dashboard/posts/new) and help build the world's best AI prompt library!

document.title: Getting Started with Promptexify
document.description: A comprehensive guide to help you get started with Promptexify and make the most of our AI prompt library.

body.raw:
# Getting Started with Promptexify

Welcome to Promptexify! This guide will help you navigate our platform and discover the power of high-quality AI prompts for ChatGPT, Claude, Midjourney, and DALL-E.

## Quick Start Guide

### 1. Browse Our Prompt Library

Start exploring our extensive collection of AI prompts:

- **Browse by Category**: Use our organized categories to find prompts for specific use cases
- **Search Functionality**: Use the search bar to find prompts by keywords or topics
- **Filter Options**: Filter by AI platform (ChatGPT, Claude, Midjourney, DALL-E) and difficulty level
- **Sort Options**: Sort by popularity, newest, or most effective prompts

### 2. Using Prompts Effectively

#### For Text-Based AI (ChatGPT & Claude)

1. **Copy the Prompt**: Click the copy button on any prompt card
2. **Customize Variables**: Replace placeholder text with your specific requirements
3. **Add Context**: Provide relevant background information for better results
4. **Iterate**: Refine your prompts based on the AI's responses

#### For Image AI (Midjourney & DALL-E)

1. **Study the Structure**: Notice how effective prompts are structured
2. **Understand Parameters**: Learn about style, composition, and technical parameters
3. **Experiment**: Try variations of successful prompts
4. **Save Favorites**: Bookmark prompts that work well for your projects

### 3. Account Features

#### Free Account Benefits

- Access to basic prompt library
- Bookmark up to 50 prompts
- Create personal collections
- Basic search and filtering
- Community contributions

#### Dashboard Navigation

- **Bookmarks**: Save prompts you want to use later
- **Favorites**: Mark your most-used prompts for quick access
- **Contribute**: Share your own tested prompts with the community
- **Account Settings**: Manage your profile and preferences

## Platform-Specific Tips

### ChatGPT Prompts

- **Be Specific**: The more detailed your prompt, the better the output
- **Use Role-Playing**: Ask ChatGPT to assume specific roles or expertise
- **Request Formats**: Specify the desired output format (lists, tables, essays)
- **Set Constraints**: Include word limits, tone, or style requirements

**Example Structure:**

```
Act as a [ROLE]. Create a [OUTPUT TYPE] about [TOPIC] that [SPECIFIC REQUIREMENTS].
The tone should be [TONE] and include [SPECIFIC ELEMENTS].
```

### Claude Prompts

- **Leverage Analysis**: Claude excels at analytical and reasoning tasks
- **Use Clear Structure**: Break complex requests into numbered steps
- **Request Citations**: Ask for sources and evidence when needed
- **Iterative Refinement**: Build on previous responses for complex projects

### Midjourney Prompts

- **Style References**: Include artistic styles, photographers, or movements
- **Technical Parameters**: Use aspect ratios, quality settings, and stylization
- **Composition Keywords**: Include framing, lighting, and perspective terms
- **Negative Prompts**: Specify what you don't want in the image

**Basic Structure:**

```
[SUBJECT] [STYLE] [COMPOSITION] [LIGHTING] [PARAMETERS]
```

### DALL-E Prompts

- **Descriptive Language**: Use clear, vivid descriptions
- **Artistic Styles**: Reference specific art movements or techniques
- **Technical Details**: Include camera angles, lighting, and mood
- **Context Setting**: Describe the environment and atmosphere

## Best Practices

### 1. Start Simple

- Begin with basic prompts and gradually add complexity
- Test fundamental concepts before adding advanced parameters
- Build a library of working prompts for your use cases

### 2. Document Your Results

- Keep notes on what works for your specific needs
- Track successful prompt variations
- Create personal templates for recurring tasks

### 3. Community Engagement

- Rate prompts you've tested to help others
- Share your successful modifications
- Ask questions in community discussions
- Contribute your own tested prompts

### 4. Stay Updated

- Check for new prompts regularly
- Follow prompt trends and techniques
- Learn from community feedback and ratings
- Experiment with new AI model capabilities

## Common Use Cases

### Content Creation

- Blog posts and articles
- Social media content
- Marketing copy
- Creative writing
- Technical documentation

### Business Applications

- Email templates
- Presentation outlines
- Strategic planning
- Data analysis
- Customer service responses

### Creative Projects

- Story development
- Character creation
- Art concepts
- Music ideas
- Design briefs

### Educational Support

- Lesson planning
- Study guides
- Research assistance
- Explanation generation
- Skill development

## Troubleshooting

### Common Issues

**Prompts Not Working as Expected?**

- Check if you've customized placeholder text
- Ensure you're using the correct AI platform
- Verify prompt compatibility with your AI model version

**Can't Find Specific Prompts?**

- Use multiple search terms
- Browse related categories
- Check spelling and synonyms
- Use filters to narrow results

**Poor Output Quality?**

- Add more context to your prompt
- Be more specific about requirements
- Try different prompt variations
- Check if the prompt needs personalization

## Getting Help

Need additional support? We're here to help:

- **Community Forums**: Connect with other users
- **Help Documentation**: Comprehensive guides and tutorials
- **Contact Support**: Direct assistance for technical issues
- **Video Tutorials**: Visual guides for complex features

## Next Steps

Ready to dive deeper? Check out these resources:

1. **[Premium Features](/dashboard/help/premium)**: Learn about advanced capabilities
2. **[Contributing Guide](/dashboard/help/contributing)**: Share your prompts with the community
3. **[Support Center](/dashboard/help/support)**: Get help when you need it

---

Start exploring our prompt library today and unlock the full potential of AI-powered creativity and productivity!

document.title: Premium Features & Upgrade Guide
document.description: Discover the advanced features available with Promptexify Premium and learn how to upgrade your account for enhanced AI prompt capabilities.

body.raw:
# Premium Features & Upgrade Guide

Unlock the full potential of Promptexify with our Premium subscription. Get access to advanced prompts, exclusive features, and priority support.

## Premium Features Overview

### ðŸš€ Advanced Prompt Library

**Exclusive Premium Prompts**

- Professional-grade prompts for business applications
- Advanced creative prompts for complex projects
- Industry-specific prompt collections
- Beta access to new prompt categories

**Enhanced Search & Discovery**

- AI-powered prompt recommendations
- Advanced filtering and sorting options
- Personalized prompt suggestions based on usage
- Priority access to trending prompts

### ðŸ“Š Analytics & Insights

**Usage Analytics**

- Track your most effective prompts
- Monitor performance across different AI platforms
- Analyze success rates and optimization opportunities
- Export usage data and reports

**Performance Metrics**

- Prompt effectiveness ratings
- Time-saving calculations
- ROI tracking for business users
- Personalized improvement suggestions

### ðŸŽ¯ Advanced Organization

**Unlimited Collections**

- Create unlimited custom collections
- Advanced tagging and categorization
- Team collaboration features (coming soon)
- Priority organization tools

**Smart Bookmarking**

- Unlimited bookmarks and favorites
- Auto-categorization of saved prompts
- Quick access to frequently used prompts
- Cross-platform synchronization

### ðŸ”§ Premium Tools

**Prompt Optimizer**

- AI-assisted prompt improvement suggestions
- A/B testing capabilities for prompt variations
- Performance optimization recommendations
- Automated prompt refinement tools

**Custom Templates**

- Create personal prompt templates
- Share templates with team members
- Template versioning and history
- Bulk template operations

### ðŸ’¼ Business Features

**Team Management** (Enterprise)

- Multi-user account management
- Role-based access controls
- Team analytics and reporting
- Centralized billing and administration

**API Access** (Enterprise)

- Direct API integration with your applications
- Bulk prompt retrieval and management
- Custom webhook configurations
- Developer tools and documentation

### ðŸŽ¨ Creative Suite

**Advanced Image Prompts**

- Professional photography prompts
- Commercial art generation prompts
- Brand-specific style guides
- High-resolution output optimization

**Video & Animation Prompts**

- Motion graphics prompts
- Video concept development
- Animation style guides
- Storyboard creation prompts

## Subscription Plans

### Premium Individual - $9.99/month

**Perfect for content creators, freelancers, and professionals**

âœ… Access to all premium prompts (2000+ exclusive)  
âœ… Unlimited bookmarks and collections  
âœ… Advanced search and filtering  
âœ… Usage analytics and insights  
âœ… Prompt optimization tools  
âœ… Priority customer support  
âœ… Early access to new features  
âœ… Ad-free experience

### Premium Team - $29.99/month

**Ideal for small teams and agencies (up to 5 users)**

âœ… All Premium Individual features  
âœ… Team collaboration tools  
âœ… Shared collections and templates  
âœ… Team usage analytics  
âœ… Admin dashboard  
âœ… Priority support with dedicated account manager

### Enterprise - Custom Pricing

**For large organizations with specific requirements**

âœ… All Premium Team features  
âœ… Custom prompt development  
âœ… API access and integrations  
âœ… SSO and advanced security  
âœ… Custom onboarding and training  
âœ… Dedicated account management  
âœ… SLA guarantees

## How to Upgrade

### Step-by-Step Upgrade Process

1. **Navigate to Billing**

   - Go to your dashboard
   - Click on "Account" or "Billing" in the sidebar
   - Or visit `/dashboard/billing` directly

2. **Choose Your Plan**

   - Review available subscription options
   - Compare features and pricing
   - Select the plan that best fits your needs

3. **Secure Payment**

   - Enter your payment information securely
   - Choose monthly or annual billing (save 20% with annual)
   - Review and confirm your subscription

4. **Instant Access**
   - Premium features activate immediately
   - Start exploring exclusive content right away
   - Receive welcome email with premium tips

### Payment Options

**Accepted Payment Methods**

- Credit Cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express)
- PayPal
- Bank transfers (Enterprise plans)
- Corporate invoicing (Enterprise plans)

**Billing Cycles**

- Monthly billing: Charged every month
- Annual billing: 20% discount, charged yearly
- Enterprise: Custom billing terms available

### Upgrade Benefits

**Immediate Access**

- Instant unlock of premium prompts
- Advanced features available right away
- No waiting period or approval process

**Grandfathered Pricing**

- Lock in current pricing with annual plans
- Protected from future price increases
- Transparent billing with no hidden fees

## Premium Prompt Categories

### Business & Professional

**Marketing & Sales**

- Advanced copywriting prompts
- A/B testing message variations
- Customer persona development
- Campaign strategy generation

**Management & Strategy**

- Executive communication templates
- Strategic planning frameworks
- Performance review templates
- Meeting facilitation guides

**Data & Analytics**

- Advanced data analysis prompts
- Report generation templates
- Visualization guidance
- Insights extraction frameworks

### Creative & Design

**Advanced Visual Arts**

- Professional photography styles
- Commercial design concepts
- Brand identity development
- Artistic movement interpretations

**Content Creation**

- Long-form content strategies
- Multi-platform content adaptation
- Audience-specific messaging
- Content series development

### Technical & Development

**Programming & Development**

- Architecture design prompts
- Code optimization strategies
- Technical documentation templates
- System design frameworks

**AI & Machine Learning**

- Model training prompts
- Algorithm explanation templates
- Technical research frameworks
- Implementation guidance

## Success Stories

### Content Creator - Sarah M.

_"Premium prompts increased my content creation speed by 300%. The industry-specific templates save me hours of research and brainstorming."_

**Results:**

- 3x faster content creation
- 50% increase in engagement rates
- Expanded to 3 new content verticals

### Marketing Agency - TechFlow Solutions

_"The team features and advanced prompts transformed our client deliverables. We're delivering higher quality work in half the time."_

**Results:**

- 40% reduction in project turnaround time
- 25% increase in client satisfaction scores
- Scaled team from 5 to 12 people

### Enterprise - GlobalCorp Inc.

_"Custom prompts and API integration streamlined our entire content workflow. ROI was positive within the first month."_

**Results:**

- $50K+ monthly cost savings
- 80% reduction in content production time
- Standardized quality across all departments

## Frequently Asked Questions

### Billing & Subscriptions

**Q: Can I cancel anytime?**
A: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. You'll retain access until the end of your current billing period.

**Q: Is there a free trial?**
A: We offer a 7-day free trial for all premium plans. No credit card required to start.

**Q: Do you offer refunds?**
A: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for first-time subscribers.

### Features & Access

**Q: What happens to my bookmarks if I downgrade?**
A: Your bookmarks remain saved but may be limited to the free plan quota. Premium bookmarks become read-only.

**Q: Can I share premium prompts with others?**
A: Premium prompts are for your personal or team use only. Sharing outside your account violates our terms of service.

**Q: Do premium prompts work with all AI platforms?**
A: Yes, our premium prompts are designed to work across ChatGPT, Claude, Midjourney, DALL-E, and other major AI platforms.

## Getting Started with Premium

### First Steps After Upgrade

1. **Explore Premium Categories**

   - Browse exclusive premium sections
   - Test advanced prompts in your preferred AI platform
   - Bookmark promising prompts for future use

2. **Set Up Your Workspace**

   - Create custom collections for your projects
   - Organize prompts by use case or client
   - Configure notification preferences

3. **Join Premium Community**
   - Access premium user forums
   - Connect with other professionals
   - Share experiences and best practices

### Maximizing Your Investment

**Weekly Routine**

- Explore new premium additions every week
- Test 3-5 new prompts in your workflow
- Track which prompts provide the best results

**Monthly Review**

- Analyze your usage statistics
- Identify your most valuable prompt categories
- Adjust your workflow based on performance data

## Support & Resources

### Premium Support Channels

**Priority Support**

- 24-hour response time guarantee
- Direct access to prompt experts
- Video call support for complex issues

**Exclusive Resources**

- Premium user documentation
- Advanced tutorial library
- Monthly expert webinars

**Community Access**

- Premium user forums
- Beta testing opportunities
- Direct feedback to product team

### Need Help?

Ready to upgrade or have questions about premium features?

- **Live Chat**: Available 24/7 for premium subscribers
- **Email Support**: premium@promptexify.com
- **Phone Support**: Available for Enterprise customers
- **Community Forums**: Connect with other premium users

---

**Ready to upgrade?** [Start your 7-day free trial today](/dashboard/billing) and experience the full power of Promptexify Premium!

document.title: Getting Support & Contact Information
document.description: Find answers to your questions and get help with Promptexify. Learn about our support resources, contact methods, and troubleshooting guides.

body.raw:
# Getting Support & Contact Information

Need help with Promptexify? We're here to assist you! This comprehensive guide covers all the ways you can get support, find answers, and contact our team.

## Quick Help Resources

### Self-Service Options

**Help Documentation**

- Browse our comprehensive help articles
- Search specific topics and features
- Access video tutorials and guides
- Download quick reference materials

**Community Forums**

- Ask questions and get answers from other users
- Share tips and best practices
- Connect with power users and experts
- Participate in feature discussions

**FAQ Section**

- Common questions and answers
- Quick solutions to frequent issues
- Troubleshooting guides
- Feature explanations

### Knowledge Base Search

Use our intelligent search to find answers quickly:

1. **Search Bar**: Type your question in natural language
2. **Category Filters**: Narrow results by topic area
3. **Suggested Articles**: View recommended help content
4. **Related Topics**: Explore similar questions and solutions

## Contact Methods by Support Type

### Technical Support

**For Platform Issues, Bugs, and Technical Problems**

**Live Chat** (Fastest Response)

- Available 24/7 for Premium subscribers
- Business hours (9 AM - 6 PM EST) for free users
- Average response time: 5-10 minutes
- Best for urgent technical issues

**Email Support**

- Email: support@promptexify.com
- Response time: 4-12 hours (Premium), 24-48 hours (Free)
- Include screenshots and detailed problem description
- Best for complex issues requiring detailed explanation

**Support Ticket System**

- Submit detailed technical reports
- Track issue progress and resolution
- Attach files and screenshots
- Receive email updates on progress

### Account & Billing Support

**For Subscription, Payment, and Account Issues**

**Billing Support**

- Email: billing@promptexify.com
- Phone: 1-800-PROMPTX (Premium/Enterprise only)
- Response time: 2-4 hours during business hours
- Include account email and relevant details

**Account Management**

- Password resets and login issues
- Profile and preference changes
- Data export and account deletion requests
- Subscription modifications

### Content & Community Support

**For Prompt Quality, Contributions, and Community Issues**

**Content Team**

- Email: content@promptexify.com
- Report inappropriate content
- Quality feedback and suggestions
- Contribution questions and support

**Community Moderation**

- Email: community@promptexify.com
- Report violations or inappropriate behavior
- Appeal community decisions
- General community questions

### Business & Partnership Inquiries

**For Enterprise, API, and Partnership Opportunities**

**Business Development**

- Email: business@promptexify.com
- Phone: 1-800-PROMPTX (Enterprise line)
- Enterprise sales and custom solutions
- Partnership and integration opportunities

**Press & Media**

- Email: press@promptexify.com
- Media inquiries and interview requests
- Press kit and company information
- Speaking opportunities and events

## Support Tiers by Account Type

### Free Account Support

**Included Support**

- Community forums access
- Email support (48-hour response)
- Knowledge base and documentation
- Basic troubleshooting guides

**Self-Service Resources**

- Help articles and tutorials
- Video guides and walkthroughs
- FAQ section
- Community discussions

### Premium Account Support

**Enhanced Support**

- Priority email support (12-hour response)
- Live chat support (24/7)
- Phone support during business hours
- Dedicated account assistance

**Premium Resources**

- Advanced troubleshooting guides
- Exclusive video tutorials
- Early access to help content
- Premium user forums

### Enterprise Account Support

**Dedicated Support**

- Dedicated account manager
- Phone support with SLA guarantees
- Custom onboarding and training
- Priority escalation process

**Enterprise Resources**

- Custom documentation
- API support and integration help
- Team training sessions
- Regular account reviews

## Common Issues & Quick Solutions

### Login & Account Issues

**Can't Log In?**

1. **Check Your Credentials**

   - Verify email address is correct
   - Ensure password is case-sensitive
   - Try clearing browser cache and cookies

2. **Password Reset**

   - Click "Forgot Password" on login page
   - Check email for reset instructions
   - Check spam folder if email doesn't arrive
   - Use the reset link within 24 hours

3. **Account Locked or Suspended**
   - Contact support immediately
   - Provide account email and details
   - Review terms of service for violations
   - Follow provided resolution steps

**Two-Factor Authentication Issues**

1. **Lost Access to Authenticator**

   - Contact support with account verification
   - Provide backup codes if available
   - Complete identity verification process
   - Reset 2FA after account access restored

2. **Code Not Working**
   - Ensure device time is synchronized
   - Try generating a new code
   - Check for app updates
   - Contact support if problem persists

### Platform & Performance Issues

**Slow Loading or Timeouts**

1. **Browser Troubleshooting**

   - Clear browser cache and cookies
   - Disable browser extensions temporarily
   - Try incognito/private browsing mode
   - Update to latest browser version

2. **Network Issues**
   - Check internet connection stability
   - Try different network (mobile hotspot)
   - Disable VPN temporarily
   - Contact ISP if problems persist

**Features Not Working**

1. **JavaScript Disabled**

   - Enable JavaScript in browser settings
   - Whitelist promptexify.com domain
   - Disable script blockers temporarily
   - Refresh page after changes

2. **Browser Compatibility**
   - Use supported browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge)
   - Update to latest browser version
   - Clear cache and try again
   - Try different browser to isolate issue

### Content & Search Issues

**Can't Find Specific Prompts**

1. **Search Optimization**

   - Use specific keywords and terms
   - Try different search variations
   - Use category filters to narrow results
   - Browse by platform or use case

2. **Content Availability**
   - Check if content requires premium subscription
   - Verify content is published and available
   - Look for similar alternatives
   - Request specific content through support

**Prompts Not Working as Expected**

1. **Customization Required**

   - Replace placeholder text with your content
   - Adjust parameters for your specific use case
   - Follow provided usage instructions
   - Test with different variations

2. **Platform Compatibility**
   - Verify prompt is designed for your AI platform
   - Check for platform-specific instructions
   - Adjust formatting if necessary
   - Contact contributor for clarification

### Billing & Subscription Issues

**Payment Problems**

1. **Card Declined**

   - Verify card information is correct
   - Check with bank for international transactions
   - Ensure sufficient funds available
   - Try alternative payment method

2. **Subscription Not Active**
   - Check email for payment confirmation
   - Allow 5-10 minutes for activation
   - Clear browser cache and log back in
   - Contact billing support if issue persists

**Upgrade or Downgrade Issues**

1. **Plan Changes**
   - Changes take effect at next billing cycle
   - Prorated charges/credits applied automatically
   - Access to features may change immediately
   - Contact billing for immediate changes

## Escalation Process

### When to Escalate

**Urgent Issues**

- Security concerns or data breaches
- Payment processing errors
- Account access completely blocked
- Critical bugs affecting core functionality

**Standard Escalation Path**

1. **Level 1**: Live chat or email support
2. **Level 2**: Senior technical support
3. **Level 3**: Engineering team review
4. **Level 4**: Management and executive review

### Escalation Contacts

**Urgent Security Issues**

- Email: security@promptexify.com
- Response time: 1-2 hours
- Include detailed threat description
- Mark subject as "URGENT SECURITY"

**Executive Support**

- Email: executive@promptexify.com
- For unresolved issues after standard support
- Enterprise customers with SLA violations
- Critical business impact situations

## Self-Help Resources

### Video Tutorials

**Getting Started Series**

- Account setup and basic navigation
- Finding and using prompts effectively
- Customization and optimization tips
- Platform-specific guidance

**Advanced Features**

- Premium features overview
- Advanced search and filtering
- Collection and organization tools
- Contribution and community features

### Documentation Library

**User Guides**

- Comprehensive feature documentation
- Step-by-step tutorials
- Best practices and tips
- Troubleshooting guides

**API Documentation** (Enterprise)

- Integration guides and examples
- Authentication and security
- Rate limits and usage guidelines
- SDK and wrapper libraries

### Community Resources

**User Forums**

- General questions and discussions
- Feature requests and feedback
- Tips and tricks sharing
- Community-driven support

**Expert Network**

- Connect with verified experts
- Get advice on specific use cases
- Learn advanced techniques
- Access exclusive insights

## Feedback & Suggestions

### How to Provide Feedback

**Feature Requests**

- Submit through feedback form in app
- Describe use case and benefits
- Include mockups or examples if helpful
- Vote on existing requests in community

**Bug Reports**

- Include detailed steps to reproduce
- Provide browser and device information
- Attach screenshots or videos
- Rate severity and impact

**General Feedback**

- Email: feedback@promptexify.com
- Share your overall experience
- Suggest improvements or changes
- Tell us what you love about the platform

### Feedback Response Process

1. **Acknowledgment**: We'll confirm receipt within 24 hours
2. **Review**: Our team evaluates all feedback weekly
3. **Prioritization**: Features are prioritized based on user needs
4. **Updates**: We'll keep you informed of significant developments

## Emergency Contacts

### Critical Issues (24/7)

**System Outages**

- Status page: status.promptexify.com
- Twitter: @PromptexifyStatus
- Emergency hotline: 1-800-PROMPTX (ext. 911)

**Security Incidents**

- Email: security@promptexify.com
- Phone: 1-800-PROMPTX (ext. 999)
- Response time: 1-2 hours maximum

### Business Hours Support

**Standard Support Hours**

- Monday-Friday: 9 AM - 6 PM EST
- Saturday: 10 AM - 4 PM EST
- Sunday: Closed (Emergency only)

**Holiday Schedule**

- Reduced hours during major holidays
- Emergency support always available
- Schedule posted on status page

## Regional Support

### International Support

**European Users**

- Email: support-eu@promptexify.com
- Hours: 9 AM - 6 PM CET
- Languages: English, German, French

**Asia-Pacific Users**

- Email: support-apac@promptexify.com
- Hours: 9 AM - 6 PM JST
- Languages: English, Japanese

**Americas Users**

- Email: support@promptexify.com
- Hours: 9 AM - 6 PM EST
- Languages: English, Spanish, Portuguese

---

**Still need help?** Contact our support team directly:

- **Live Chat**: Available in your dashboard
- **Email**: support@promptexify.com
- **Community**: Join our user forums
- **Phone**: 1-800-PROMPTX (Premium/Enterprise)

We're committed to providing excellent support and helping you succeed with Promptexify!

document.title: About Promptexify
document.description: Learn about Promptexify - your comprehensive source for AI prompts across ChatGPT, Claude, Midjourney, and DALL-E platforms.

body.raw:
# About Promptexify

Welcome to **Promptexify** - your ultimate destination for discovering, sharing, and optimizing AI prompts across multiple platforms. We're passionate about empowering creators, professionals, and enthusiasts to unlock the full potential of artificial intelligence through expertly crafted prompts.

## Our Mission

At Promptexify, we believe that the quality of AI interactions depends heavily on the quality of prompts used. Our mission is to democratize access to high-quality AI prompts, making it easier for everyone to achieve better results with AI tools like ChatGPT, Claude, Midjourney, and DALL-E.

## What We Offer

### Comprehensive Prompt Library

Our extensive collection features:

- **ChatGPT Prompts**: Creative writing, business communications, educational content, and more
- **Claude Prompts**: Data analysis, research methodology, legal document analysis, and professional workflows
- **Midjourney Prompts**: Artistic creations, photography styles, architectural visualization, and design concepts
- **DALL-E Prompts**: Logo design, illustrations, infographics, and visual content creation

### Curated Quality

Every prompt in our collection is:

- âœ… **Tested and verified** for effectiveness
- âœ… **Categorized systematically** for easy discovery
- âœ… **Regularly updated** to reflect best practices
- âœ… **Community-reviewed** for quality assurance

### User-Centric Features

- **Smart Search**: Find exactly what you need with our advanced filtering system
- **Personalized Collections**: Save and organize your favorite prompts
- **Community Contributions**: Share your own prompts with the community
- **Premium Content**: Access advanced prompts for professional use cases

## Our Community

Promptexify is built by and for the AI community. We're a diverse group of:

- Content creators and marketers
- Developers and data scientists
- Artists and designers
- Educators and researchers
- Business professionals
- AI enthusiasts

## Quality Standards

We maintain high standards for all content on our platform:

### Content Review Process

1. **Initial Screening**: All submissions undergo automated and manual review
2. **Testing Phase**: Prompts are tested across different scenarios
3. **Community Feedback**: Users can rate and provide feedback on prompt effectiveness
4. **Continuous Improvement**: Regular updates based on user experience and AI model evolution

### Security & Privacy

- All user data is handled with strict privacy policies
- Secure authentication and data protection measures
- Transparent data usage policies
- GDPR and privacy regulation compliance

## Get Involved

### For Contributors

- **Share Your Prompts**: Submit your tested prompts to help the community
- **Provide Feedback**: Rate and review prompts to maintain quality
- **Join Discussions**: Participate in community forums and feedback sessions

### For Businesses

- **Premium Access**: Advanced prompt libraries for professional use
- **Custom Solutions**: Tailored prompt development for specific industries
- **Team Collaboration**: Tools for sharing and managing prompts across teams

## Technology

Promptexify is built with modern, secure technologies:

- **Next.js & React**: For a fast, responsive user experience
- **TypeScript**: Ensuring code reliability and maintainability
- **Supabase**: Secure authentication and real-time features
- **PostgreSQL**: Robust data management and search capabilities
- **Contentlayer**: Optimized content management and delivery

## Future Vision

We're continuously evolving to serve our community better:

- **AI-Powered Recommendations**: Personalized prompt suggestions
- **Advanced Analytics**: Track prompt performance and optimization
- **Integration Tools**: Direct integration with popular AI platforms
- **Mobile Experience**: Enhanced mobile app for on-the-go access
- **Collaboration Features**: Team workspaces and shared collections

## Contact Us

Have questions, suggestions, or want to collaborate? We'd love to hear from you:

- **Email**: hello@promptexify.com
- **Community**: Join our discussions and forums
- **Support**: Get help with our comprehensive documentation

---

document.title: Contact Us
document.description: Get in touch with the Promptexify team for support, partnerships, feedback, or general inquiries.

body.raw:
# Contact Us

We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have questions, feedback, suggestions, or want to explore partnership opportunities, the Promptexify team is here to help.

## General Inquiries

For general questions about Promptexify, our services, or how to get started:

**Email**: hello@promptexify.com  
**Response Time**: We typically respond within 24-48 hours

## Support & Technical Help

Need help with your account, experiencing technical issues, or have questions about using the platform?

**Email**: support@promptexify.com  
**Response Time**: We aim to respond to support requests within 12-24 hours

### Common Support Topics

- Account setup and management
- Password reset and login issues
- Prompt submission and publishing
- Premium account features
- Technical troubleshooting
- Platform navigation and features

## Partnership & Business Development

Interested in collaborating with us or exploring business opportunities?

**Email**: partnerships@promptexify.com  
**Response Time**: Business inquiries are typically reviewed within 3-5 business days

### Partnership Opportunities

- **Content Creators**: Collaborate on premium prompt collections
- **Educational Institutions**: Bulk licensing and educational programs
- **Businesses**: Custom prompt development and enterprise solutions
- **AI Platforms**: Integration and technical partnerships
- **Influencers**: Brand partnership and ambassador programs

## Content & Community

Have a prompt to share, feedback about our content, or want to contribute to the community?

**Email**: community@promptexify.com  
**Response Time**: Community submissions are reviewed within 2-3 business days

### Content Contributions

- Submit your original prompts for review
- Suggest improvements to existing prompts
- Report content issues or inaccuracies
- Community guidelines questions
- Featured contributor opportunities

## Media & Press

Journalists, bloggers, and media professionals looking for information about Promptexify:

**Email**: press@promptexify.com  
**Response Time**: Media inquiries are prioritized and typically responded to within 24 hours

### Press Resources

- Company information and backgrounders
- Executive interviews and quotes
- High-resolution logos and brand assets
- Industry insights and expert commentary
- Product announcements and updates

## Security & Privacy

Questions about our security practices, privacy policies, or need to report a security concern?

**Email**: security@promptexify.com  
**Response Time**: Security matters are our top priority and are addressed immediately

### Security Matters

- Report security vulnerabilities
- Privacy policy questions
- Data deletion requests (GDPR)
- Account security concerns
- Suspicious activity reports

## Feedback & Suggestions

Your input helps us improve! Share your ideas, feature requests, or general feedback:

**Email**: feedback@promptexify.com  
**Response Time**: We review all feedback and respond to actionable suggestions within a week

### What We'd Love to Hear About

- New features you'd like to see
- User experience improvements
- Additional AI platforms to support
- Community features and tools
- Content categorization suggestions

## Social Media

Connect with us on social media for updates, community highlights, and daily inspiration:

- **Twitter/X**: @promptexify
- **LinkedIn**: /company/promptexify
- **GitHub**: /promptexify (for open-source contributions)

## Office Hours

While we're a remote-first team, we're available during these hours for urgent matters:

- **Monday - Friday**: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM (EST)
- **Weekends**: Limited availability for urgent matters only

## Frequently Asked Questions

Before reaching out, you might find your answer in our comprehensive FAQ section:

### Account Questions

- How do I create an account?
- What's the difference between free and premium accounts?
- How do I reset my password?
- Can I delete my account?

### Prompt Submission

- How do I submit a prompt for review?
- What makes a good prompt?
- How long does the review process take?
- Can I edit my submitted prompts?

### Technical Support

- Why can't I access certain prompts?
- How do I report a bug?
- Is there a mobile app?
- How do I export my saved prompts?

## Response Time Commitment

We're committed to providing timely responses to all inquiries:

| Type                    | Target Response Time |
| ----------------------- | -------------------- |
| Security Issues         | Immediate            |
| Technical Support       | 12-24 hours          |
| General Inquiries       | 24-48 hours          |
| Business Development    | 3-5 business days    |
| Community Contributions | 2-3 business days    |
| Media Requests          | 24 hours             |

## Legal Notices

For legal matters, terms of service questions, or formal notices:

**Email**: legal@promptexify.com  
**Address**:
Promptexify Legal Department  
123 Innovation Drive  
San Francisco, CA 94105  
United States

---

## Get Started Today

Ready to explore the world of AI prompts? [Sign up for free](/signup) and join thousands of creators, professionals, and AI enthusiasts who trust Promptexify for their prompt needs.

---

_Last updated: December 29, 2024_

Thank you for choosing Promptexify. We look forward to hearing from you!

document.title: Privacy Policy
document.description: Our comprehensive privacy policy covering data collection, usage, protection, and your rights regarding personal information on Promptexify.

body.raw:
# Privacy Policy

**Effective Date**: December 29, 2024  
**Last Updated**: December 29, 2024

At Promptexify, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, share, and protect your information when you use our platform and services.

## 1. Information We Collect

### 1.1 Information You Provide Directly

When you use Promptexify, you may provide us with:

**Account Information**:

- Name and email address
- Username and password (encrypted)
- Profile information and preferences
- Payment information (processed securely through third-party providers)

**Content and Communications**:

- Prompts you submit or create
- Comments, ratings, and reviews
- Messages sent through our platform
- Support inquiries and feedback

**Subscription and Usage Data**:

- Subscription plan and billing information
- Feature usage and preferences
- Saved prompts and collections

### 1.2 Information We Collect Automatically

When you use our platform, we automatically collect:

**Technical Information**:

- IP address and device identifiers
- Browser type and version
- Operating system information
- Device characteristics and settings

**Usage Analytics**:

- Pages visited and time spent on platform
- Click patterns and navigation behavior
- Search queries and filter preferences
- Feature usage and interaction data

**Cookies and Similar Technologies**:

- Essential cookies for platform functionality
- Analytics cookies for performance monitoring
- Preference cookies for customization
- Marketing cookies (with your consent)

### 1.3 Information from Third Parties

We may receive information from:

- Authentication providers (Google, GitHub, etc.)
- Payment processors for subscription management
- Analytics and marketing service providers
- Public databases and social media platforms (with your consent)

## 2. How We Use Your Information

### 2.1 Primary Uses

We use your information to:

- Provide and maintain our platform services
- Authenticate your account and verify your identity
- Process payments and manage subscriptions
- Deliver personalized content and recommendations
- Communicate with you about your account and our services
- Provide customer support and respond to inquiries

### 2.2 Improvement and Analytics

We analyze usage data to:

- Improve platform performance and reliability
- Develop new features and services
- Understand user behavior and preferences
- Optimize user experience and interface design
- Conduct research and statistical analysis

### 2.3 Marketing and Communications

With your consent, we may:

- Send newsletters and product updates
- Provide information about new features
- Share relevant promotional content
- Conduct surveys and gather feedback
- Personalize marketing messages

### 2.4 Legal and Security

We process information when necessary to:

- Comply with legal obligations and court orders
- Protect against fraud and security threats
- Enforce our Terms of Use and community guidelines
- Investigate violations and abuse reports
- Maintain platform safety and integrity

## 3. Legal Basis for Processing (GDPR)

For users in the European Union, our legal bases for processing include:

**Contract Performance**: Processing necessary to provide our services and fulfill our contract with you
**Legitimate Interests**: Improving our services, security, and customer support
**Legal Compliance**: Meeting regulatory requirements and legal obligations
**Consent**: Processing based on your explicit consent (which you can withdraw at any time)

## 4. Information Sharing and Disclosure

### 4.1 We Do Not Sell Personal Information

We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal information to third parties for marketing purposes.

### 4.2 Service Providers

We may share information with trusted service providers who:

- Help us operate and improve our platform
- Process payments and manage subscriptions
- Provide analytics and performance monitoring
- Offer customer support services
- Ensure platform security and fraud prevention

### 4.3 Legal Requirements

We may disclose information when required by law or to:

- Comply with legal processes and government requests
- Protect our rights, property, and safety
- Protect the rights and safety of our users
- Investigate fraud or security incidents
- Enforce our Terms of Use

### 4.4 Business Transfers

In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred as part of the transaction, subject to equivalent privacy protections.

### 4.5 Public Content

Information you choose to make public (such as published prompts, comments, and ratings) may be visible to other users and search engines.

## 5. Data Security and Protection

### 5.1 Security Measures

We implement comprehensive security measures including:

- Industry-standard encryption for data transmission and storage
- Secure authentication and access controls
- Regular security audits and vulnerability assessments
- Employee training on data protection practices
- Incident response procedures

### 5.2 Data Minimization

We collect and retain only the information necessary to provide our services and comply with legal requirements.

### 5.3 Access Controls

Access to personal information is restricted to authorized personnel who need the information to perform their job functions.

## 6. Your Privacy Rights and Choices

### 6.1 Account Management

You can:

- Access and update your account information
- Change your privacy preferences
- Manage email and notification settings
- Delete your account and associated data

### 6.2 GDPR Rights (EU Users)

Under GDPR, you have the right to:

- **Access**: Request a copy of your personal data
- **Rectification**: Correct inaccurate or incomplete information
- **Erasure**: Request deletion of your personal data
- **Portability**: Receive your data in a machine-readable format
- **Restriction**: Limit how we process your information
- **Objection**: Object to certain types of processing
- **Withdraw Consent**: Remove consent for voluntary processing

### 6.3 California Privacy Rights (CCPA)

California residents have additional rights including:

- Right to know what personal information is collected
- Right to delete personal information
- Right to opt-out of the sale of personal information
- Right to non-discrimination for exercising privacy rights

### 6.4 Cookie Management

You can control cookies through:

- Browser settings and preferences
- Our cookie consent management tool
- Opt-out links for specific services
- Third-party opt-out mechanisms

## 7. Data Retention

### 7.1 Retention Periods

We retain information for as long as necessary to:

- Provide our services to you
- Comply with legal obligations
- Resolve disputes and enforce agreements
- Maintain security and prevent fraud

### 7.2 Specific Retention Periods

- **Account Data**: Retained while your account is active
- **Usage Analytics**: Typically retained for 2-3 years
- **Support Communications**: Retained for 3 years after resolution
- **Payment Records**: Retained for 7 years for tax and legal compliance

### 7.3 Data Deletion

When information is no longer needed, we securely delete or anonymize it according to our data retention schedule.

## 8. International Data Transfers

### 8.1 Data Processing Locations

Your information may be processed in countries other than your residence, including the United States.

### 8.2 Transfer Safeguards

For international transfers, we implement appropriate safeguards such as:

- Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs)
- Adequacy decisions by relevant authorities
- Binding corporate rules
- User consent where required

## 9. Children's Privacy

### 9.1 Age Requirements

Our platform is not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

### 9.2 Parental Consent

Users between 13-18 must have parental consent to use our services.

### 9.3 Data Discovery

If we discover we have collected information from a child under 13, we will promptly delete such information.

## 10. Third-Party Services and Links

### 10.1 External Links

Our platform may contain links to third-party websites and services that have their own privacy policies.

### 10.2 AI Platform Integration

We may integrate with third-party AI platforms. Your use of such integrations is subject to those platforms' terms and privacy policies.

### 10.3 No Responsibility

We are not responsible for the privacy practices of third-party services and encourage you to review their privacy policies.

## 11. Privacy Policy Updates

### 11.1 Change Notification

We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Material changes will be communicated through:

- Email notification to registered users
- Platform announcements and notices
- Updated effective date at the top of this policy

### 11.2 Continued Use

Your continued use of our platform after policy changes constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.

## 12. Contact Us

### 12.1 Privacy Inquiries

For questions about this Privacy Policy or your personal data:

**Email**: privacy@promptexify.com  
**Response Time**: We typically respond within 5 business days

### 12.2 Data Protection Officer

For EU-related inquiries:

**Email**: dpo@promptexify.com

### 12.3 Mailing Address

Promptexify Privacy Department  
123 Innovation Drive  
San Francisco, CA 94105  
United States

## 13. Exercising Your Rights

### 13.1 Request Process

To exercise your privacy rights:

1. Send a request to privacy@promptexify.com
2. Include your full name and email address associated with your account
3. Specify which right you wish to exercise
4. Provide verification of your identity if requested

### 13.2 Response Timeline

We will respond to your request:

- Within 30 days for most requests
- Within 72 hours for data breach notifications
- We may extend the response period by an additional 60 days for complex requests

### 13.3 Appeals Process

If you're not satisfied with our response, you can:

- Contact us again with additional information
- File a complaint with your local data protection authority
- Seek legal remedies as provided by applicable law

## 14. Specific Privacy Notices

### 14.1 Marketing Communications

- We only send marketing emails to users who have opted in
- Every marketing email includes an unsubscribe link
- You can manage preferences through your account settings

### 14.2 Analytics and Tracking

- We use analytics tools to understand user behavior
- Analytics data is aggregated and anonymized when possible
- You can opt-out of certain tracking through browser settings

### 14.3 AI and Machine Learning

- We may use aggregated, anonymized data to improve our AI recommendations
- Personal data is not used to train external AI models without consent
- You can opt-out of AI-powered features through your account settings

---

## Summary

At Promptexify, we are committed to:

- Protecting your personal information with industry-standard security
- Being transparent about our data practices
- Respecting your privacy rights and choices
- Complying with applicable privacy laws and regulations
- Continuously improving our privacy practices

For any privacy-related questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us at privacy@promptexify.com.

---

_This Privacy Policy was last updated on December 29, 2024. We encourage you to review this policy periodically to stay informed about how we protect your information._

document.title: Terms of Use
document.description: Terms and conditions for using Promptexify platform, including user rights, responsibilities, and platform policies.

body.raw:
# Terms of Use

**Effective Date**: December 29, 2024  
**Last Updated**: December 29, 2024

Welcome to Promptexify! These Terms of Use ("Terms") govern your access to and use of the Promptexify platform, website, and services (collectively, the "Service"). By accessing or using our Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms.

## 1. Acceptance of Terms

By creating an account, accessing, or using Promptexify, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and our [Privacy Policy](/privacy-policy). If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use our Service.

### 1.1 Eligibility

- You must be at least 13 years old to use our Service
- If you are under 18, you must have parental or guardian consent
- You must provide accurate and complete information when creating an account
- You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account

## 2. Description of Service

Promptexify is a platform that provides:

- A curated collection of AI prompts for various platforms (ChatGPT, Claude, Midjourney, DALL-E, etc.)
- Tools for discovering, saving, and organizing prompts
- Community features for sharing and rating prompts
- Premium content and advanced features for paid subscribers

### 2.1 Service Availability

- We strive to maintain service availability but cannot guarantee 100% uptime
- We may modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of the Service at any time
- We may impose usage limits or restrictions on certain features

## 3. User Accounts and Responsibilities

### 3.1 Account Creation

- You must provide accurate, current, and complete information
- You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials
- You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account
- One person or entity may not maintain more than one account

### 3.2 User Conduct

You agree not to:

- Violate any applicable laws or regulations
- Infringe on intellectual property rights of others
- Upload malicious software, viruses, or harmful code
- Attempt to gain unauthorized access to the Service or other users' accounts
- Use the Service for spam, harassment, or abusive behavior
- Impersonate other users or entities
- Interfere with the proper functioning of the Service

### 3.3 Content Standards

When contributing content to Promptexify, you must:

- Ensure content is original or properly attributed
- Avoid offensive, discriminatory, or harmful content
- Respect copyright and intellectual property rights
- Provide accurate descriptions and categorizations
- Follow our community guidelines and content policies

## 4. Intellectual Property Rights

### 4.1 Promptexify Content

- The Promptexify platform, including its design, features, and functionality, is owned by Promptexify
- Our trademarks, logos, and brand elements are protected intellectual property
- You may not copy, modify, or distribute our proprietary content without permission

### 4.2 User-Generated Content

When you submit content to Promptexify:

- You retain ownership of your original content
- You grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, display, and distribute your content on our platform
- You represent that you have the right to grant this license
- You are responsible for ensuring your content doesn't infringe on others' rights

### 4.3 Third-Party Content

- Some prompts may reference or relate to third-party AI platforms
- We respect the intellectual property rights of third parties
- Users are responsible for complying with third-party terms of service when using prompts

## 5. Privacy and Data Protection

Your privacy is important to us. Our collection, use, and sharing of your personal information is governed by our [Privacy Policy](/privacy-policy), which is incorporated into these Terms by reference.

### 5.1 Data Security

- We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data
- You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account
- We cannot guarantee absolute security of any information transmitted over the internet

## 6. Premium Services and Billing

### 6.1 Subscription Services

- Premium features are available through paid subscription plans
- Subscription fees are billed in advance on a recurring basis
- You can cancel your subscription at any time through your account settings

### 6.2 Payment Terms

- All fees are in US dollars unless otherwise specified
- You are responsible for paying all applicable taxes
- We reserve the right to change pricing with 30 days' notice
- Refunds are handled according to our refund policy

### 6.3 Free Trial

- We may offer free trials for premium services
- Free trials automatically convert to paid subscriptions unless cancelled
- You can cancel during the trial period to avoid charges

## 7. Prohibited Uses

You may not use Promptexify to:

- Generate illegal, harmful, or malicious content
- Circumvent or attempt to circumvent security measures
- Resell or redistribute our content without permission
- Create derivative works based on our proprietary content
- Use automated tools to scrape or harvest content
- Violate the terms of service of third-party AI platforms

## 8. Content Moderation and Removal

### 8.1 Content Review

- We reserve the right to review, modify, or remove any user content
- Content may be removed for violations of these Terms or community guidelines
- We may suspend or terminate accounts for repeated violations

### 8.2 Reporting

- Users can report inappropriate content or behavior
- We investigate reports and take appropriate action
- False or malicious reports may result in account penalties

## 9. Disclaimers and Limitations of Liability

### 9.1 Service Disclaimers

- The Service is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind
- We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or effectiveness of prompts
- AI-generated content may be unpredictable or inappropriate
- Users are responsible for reviewing and validating AI outputs

### 9.2 Limitation of Liability

To the maximum extent permitted by law:

- Our liability is limited to the amount you paid for the Service in the past 12 months
- We are not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages
- We are not responsible for third-party actions or content

### 9.3 Indemnification

You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Promptexify from any claims, damages, or expenses arising from:

- Your use of the Service
- Your violation of these Terms
- Your infringement of third-party rights
- Your user-generated content

## 10. Termination

### 10.1 Termination by You

- You may terminate your account at any time through your account settings
- Upon termination, your access to premium features will cease
- Some content may remain on our platform after account deletion

### 10.2 Termination by Us

We may suspend or terminate your account for:

- Violation of these Terms or community guidelines
- Fraudulent or suspicious activity
- Non-payment of fees
- Legal or regulatory requirements

### 10.3 Effect of Termination

- You lose access to your account and any premium features
- We may delete your account data subject to legal requirements
- Certain provisions of these Terms survive termination

## 11. Changes to Terms

### 11.1 Updates

- We may update these Terms from time to time
- We will notify users of material changes via email or platform notice
- Continued use of the Service constitutes acceptance of updated Terms

### 11.2 Notification

- Notice of changes will be provided at least 30 days in advance
- You can object to changes by terminating your account
- The updated Terms become effective on the specified date

## 12. Governing Law and Dispute Resolution

### 12.1 Governing Law

These Terms are governed by the laws of the State of California, United States, without regard to conflict of law principles.

### 12.2 Dispute Resolution

- We encourage resolving disputes through direct communication first
- Binding arbitration may be required for certain disputes
- Some disputes may be resolved in small claims court

### 12.3 Jurisdiction

For disputes not subject to arbitration, you agree to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in San Francisco County, California.

## 13. General Provisions

### 13.1 Entire Agreement

These Terms, together with our Privacy Policy, constitute the entire agreement between you and Promptexify.

### 13.2 Severability

If any provision of these Terms is found invalid, the remaining provisions will remain in effect.

### 13.3 No Waiver

Our failure to enforce any provision does not waive our right to enforce it later.

### 13.4 Assignment

We may assign these Terms, but you may not assign your rights without our consent.

## 14. Contact Information

For questions about these Terms, please contact us:

**Email**: legal@promptexify.com  
**Address**:
Promptexify Legal Department  
123 Innovation Drive  
San Francisco, CA 94105  
United States

---

## Community Guidelines Summary

In addition to these Terms, please review our community guidelines:

- Be respectful and constructive
- Share high-quality, original content
- Respect intellectual property rights
- Report inappropriate behavior
- Help maintain a positive community environment

---

_By using Promptexify, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Use._

**Last updated**: December 29, 2024
